text: Be gumon, kasone, ki kufr varzidand va [monandi mocaroi Hudajʙija mardumro] az rohi Alloh taolo ʙozmedorand [azoʙe dardnok dar pes dorand] va Mascidu-l-harom, ki onro ʙaroi mardum [qiʙla va iʙodatgoh] qaror dodem, muqimu musofir dar on jaksonand va har ki dar on co ʙo sitamgori [va gunoh] inhirof ʙixohad, az azoʙe dardnok ʙa u mecasonem
